title: Low priority queue
body: I'm posting a thread just to ask a question. I have afked multiple times because of internet issues and accidentally taking tank masteries as an adc, allowing my team to remake and not lose lp. Currently I have a 10 minute low priority queue and I was wondering if this ever resets so I go back to having 5 minute low priority queues. Any answers would be appreciated, Thanks!

replies.body: Essentially, the 'size' of LPQ punishments can diminish over time as long as you aren't getting dinged for being AFK. Playing through games and building a history of non-punished games should do the trick.
